title: Americano: Who is to blame for America's failure in Afghanistan?
description: With Kabul now taken back by the Taliban and the Americans in full retreat after two decades of war, what will the USA learn from this catastrophe, if anything? Freddy Gray talks to author of After the Apocalypse: America’s Role in a World Transformed, Andrew Bacevich about the goals not met, allies abandoned and lives lost.
itunes:author: The Spectator
dc:creator: The Spectator
